ygData.msgSnippet: My cleric in EQ hit 50 donkey weeks ago........ And I still think pokemon is evil, read this: * In South Carolina a 14-year-old stands accused of smashing a
ygData.messageBody:
My cleric in EQ hit 50 donkey weeks ago........ And I still think pokemon is
evil, read this:

* In South Carolina a 14-year-old stands
accused of smashing a store window to steal
$250 worth of Pok´┐¢mon cards ´┐¢ ignoring
thousands of dollars worth of rare coins as he did so.

* Four children from one school in Philadelphia
have been arrested for attacks upon other students.
The motive for the assaults was to steal Pok´┐¢mon cards.

*Just last Thursday a man in North Carolina
was charged with assault upon a Burger King
cashier after he struck the cashier when he
did not receive a Pok´┐¢mon toy with his meal.

*At Wilson Middle School, Philadelphia two
boys assaulted an 11-year-old with a trash
can before running off with two Pok´┐¢mon
cards. The boys were arrested and charged
with robbery as well as being suspended for
five days.

* In Quebec a boy was stabbed with a
four-inch knife when trying to retrieve the
Pok´┐¢mon cards that had been stolen from his
10-year old brother the day before.

All from fgnonline a while back........ Bet there's some subliminal msg hidden
in that game that promotes violence......
